definitions: relating to the feel, appearance, or consistency of a surface or a substance

examples.text: the pie provided perfect textural contrast to the pasty sweet potato
the textural richness of the paintings

shortDefinitions: relating to feel, appearance, or consistency of surface

definitions: relating to the quality created by the combination of the different elements in a work of music or literature

examples.text: music of incredible textural richness and sophistication

shortDefinitions: relating to quality created by combination of different elements in work of music or literature
